Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: ‘Kâf. Nge’Kur’ân eZukileyo
Ke kaloku bamangaliseka kukuba kufike uMlumkisi kubo ephuma phakathi kwabo, yaye abangakholwayo bathi: “Yinto engumnqa le
Sisakuba sifile sele siluthuli, (siza kuphinda sibuyiselwe ebomini)? Oko kukubuyela (emhlabeni) okukude.”
Siyakwazi okwabo okugqitywa ngumhlaba, yaye kuThi kukho iNcwadi elondoloziweyo
Kodwa bona bayiphikile inyaniso isakuba ifikile kubo. Ngoko ke bakwimo yokudideka
Abajonganga na ezulwini ngentla kwabo ukuba Salakha njani, Salihombisa nokulihombisa kwanokuba kukanjani na ukungabi nazintanda kwalo
Kanti nomhlaba Siwandlalile Sabeka iintaba ezimile ngokuqinileyo Senza kwahluma apho kuwo (umhlaba) neentlobo zezinto ezintle
Ezinika ukhanyiselo, nesikhumbuzi kuye wonke osisicaka esibuyelayo (kuAllâh)
Kananjalo Sithobe imvula esikelelekileyo isuka esibhakabhakeni Senza ngayo kwahluma izitiya neenkozo ezivela kwisivuno
Nemithi emide yesundu ineziqhamo ezicwangciswe ngokwemiqolo eyalekeneyo
Umsindleko wezicaka (zika-Allâh), kananjalo Sinike ubomi ngayo (imvula) emhlabeni ofileyo. Lunjalo ke uvuko (lwabafileyo)
Abantu bakwaNûh baphika ngaphambili kunabo nabemi baseRassi1 nabakwaThamûd
Nabakwa-’Ad nabakwaFir’awn nabazalwana bakaLût
Nabemi basezinkunini nabantu baseTubba’, ngamnye kubo wamphika uMthunywa wabo, saza isilumkiso saM sehla (phezu kwabo) ke
Ingaba Sasilela kwindalo yokuqala kusini na? Kodwa basekudidekeni ngokuphathelene nendalo entsha
Ke kaloku Samdala umntu yaye Siyakwazi okusetyezwa ngumphefumlo wakhe kuye. Kwaye Thina Sisondele kuye kunomthovutho2 wakhe
Xa abamkeli3 ababini besamkela behleli ekunene nasekhohlo
Akukho nalinye ilizwi umntu alithethayo koko kuba sele kukho umqwalaseli osele elungele (ukubhala)
Kananjalo ukuyoba kokufa kuya kuza nenyaniso; ebenizama ukuyiphepha
Ke kaloku neXilongo liya kuvuthelwa. Leyo iya kuba iyiMini isilumkiso sasikhutshiwe (ngayo)
Umphefumlo ngamnye uya kuza nomqhubi (wawo) nengqina
(Kuya kuthiwa kuwo): “Wena wawungayinanzanga (le Mini), Sisisusile ke isigqubuthelo kuwe, (ngoku) ukubona kwakho naMhlanje kubukhali.”
Aze umqhubi wawo (ingelosi) athi: “Lo Umbhalo ngulo ukum, sele ulungiswe kakade.”
(UAllâh Uya kuthi): “Phosa esiHogweni wonke osisingcoli esineenkani ongakholwayo.”
Uya kuthi uAllâh kulowo ungumoni: “Mthinteli ndini wokulungileyo, mgabadeli ndini, mthandabuzi ndini
Lowo (walinganisa) thixo bambi noAllâh.” (Aphinde Athi kwingelosi emqhubayo): “Mphose esohlwayweni esibuhlungu.”
Umhlobo wakhe (uSathana) uya kuthi: “Nkosi yethu, asindim owamenza ukuba abe ngumgabadeli koko nguye ngokwakhe owaba sekulahlekeni (okwambeka) kude.”
(UAllâh) Uya kuthi: “Musani ukuphikisana phambi kwaM, ekubeni Ndandinilumkisile kwangenxa engaphambili.”
Ilizwi (elingummiselo) aliyi kuguqulwa kuM yaye Andisokuze Ndibe ngumsweli bulungisa kwizicaka
NgeMini eSiya kuthi esiHogweni: “Ingaba ugcwele? Siya (kuphendula) sona sithi: “Ingaba kusekho abanye na?”
Ke kaloku iPaladesi iya kusondezwa kubenzi bokulungileyo, ingabi kude
(Kuya kuthiwa): “Oku koko nanithenjiswe ngako (oko) kokwakhe wonke ongumbuyeli kuAllâh nomgcini womnqophiso waKhe
Owamoyikayo uSozinceba, Ongabonwayo, wabuyela (kuYe) ngentliziyo (enenguquko)
Ngena kuyo (iPaladesi) ngoxolo. Le yiMini yaphakade.”
Baya kufumana konke abakunqwenelayo apho, yaye kuThi kusekho nokunye okungaphaya koko
Kanti zingaphi izizukulwana eSazitshabalalisayo ngaphambili kunabo, ezazinkulu kunabo ngamandla zityhutyhe ilizwe lonke, ikhona phofu indawo yokubalekela
Inene kuko oko kukho inkumbuzo kuye nabani na ophulaphulayo lo gama ekho (ngokwasengqondweni)
Sawadala ngenene amazulu nomhlaba noko kuphakathi kuwo ngeentsuku ezintandathu kwaye akukho kudinwa kwaSichukumisayo
Ke wena yiba nomonde ngoko bakutshoyo, uzukise (uAllâh) ngendumiso yeNkosi yakho phambi kokuphuma kwelanga naphambi kokutshona kwalo
(Nakwinxalenye) yobusuku. Mzukise nasemva kokuqubuda (emthandazweni)
Ke kaloku uphulaphule ngeMini xa uMmemezi eya kumemeza kwindawo ekufuphi
NgeMini abaya kuva isithonga ngenyaniso. Leyo yiMini yokuphuma (emangcwabeni)
Inene Sithi abanika ubomi Senze nokufa yaye kuThi kulapho kuza kuphelelwa khona
NgeMini umhlaba uya kuzahlukanisa nabo (baze baphume emangcwabeni abo) ngesaquphe; olo luqokelelo olulula kuThi
Sikwazi kakuhle abakuthethayo, yaye wena awungomnyanzelisi phezu kwabo (wokubenza bakholwe ngenkani) kodwa ke wena khumbuza nge’Kur’ân nabani na lowo usoyikayo isilumkiso saM
